The code:

#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <assert.h>

#define MOD 998244353
#define __N 8000

long long g1[__N+1];
long long g2[__N+1];
long long inverse[__N+1];

void precompute() {
    g1[0] = 1;
    g1[1] = 1;
    g2[0] = 1;
    g2[1] = 1;
    inverse[0] = 0;
    inverse[1] = 1;

    for (int i=2; i<=__N; i++) {
        g1[i] = (g1[i-1] * i) % MOD;
        inverse[i] = (MOD - (inverse[MOD % i] * (MOD / i)) % MOD) % MOD;
        g2[i] = (g2[i-1] * inverse[i]) % MOD;
    }
}

long long cmb(int n, int r) {
    if (r <0 || r >n) return 0;
    if (r > n - r) r = n - r;
    return g1[n] * g2[r] % MOD * g2[n - r] % MOD;
}

long long kumiawase(int p, int q) {
    return cmb(p + q -1, q-1);
}

long long solve(int n, int K, int N) {
    assert(n <= K+1);
    long long ans =0;
    int kumi = (n-1)/2;
    for (int p=0; p <=kumi; p++) {
        if (p > N) break;
        long long term = 1LL << p;
        term %= MOD;
        term = term * cmb(kumi, p) % MOD;
        int q_part = K - 2*kumi - ( (n%2 ==0) ? 1 :0 );
        int q = p + q_part;
        term = term * kumiawase(N-p, q) % MOD;
        ans = (ans + term) % MOD;

        if ( (n%2 ==0) && (N - p -1 >=0) ) {
            long long term2 = (1LL << p) % MOD;
            term2 = term2 * cmb(kumi, p) % MOD;
            term2 = term2 * kumiawase(N-p-1, q) % MOD;
            ans = (ans + term2) % MOD;
        }
    }
    return ans % MOD;
}

int main() {
    int K, N;
    scanf("%d %d", &K, &N);
    precompute();

    // Compute the answers for the first part
    int max_i = 2*K;
    int ans_size = K+1 -2 +1; // from 2 to K+1
    long long ans[ans_size];
    int ans_idx =0;

    // First, compute the answers for i from 2 to K+1
    for (int i=2; i <= K+1; i++) {
        ans[ans_idx++] = solve(i, K, N) % MOD;
    }

    // Now, collect all outputs into an array of strings
    char outputs[max_i][20]; // assuming each number is up to 20 digits
    int output_count =0;

    for (int i=2; i <= max_i; i++) {
        if (i <= K+1) {
            // use solve(i)
            long long val = solve(i, K, N) % MOD;
            sprintf(outputs[output_count], "%lld", val);
        } else {
            // get from ans array
            int idx = (2*K -i) % K;
            long long val = ans[idx];
            sprintf(outputs[output_count], "%lld", val);
        }
        output_count++;
    }

    // Now create the input string for the second part
    char buffer[100000]; // enough size
    buffer[0] = '\0';
    for (int i=0; i < output_count; i++) {
        strcat(buffer, outputs[i]);
        strcat(buffer, "\n");
    }

    // Now process the buffer with the second part's logic
    int num_g =0, num_p=0, score=0;
    for (int i=0; i < strlen(buffer); i++) {
        char c = buffer[i];
        if (c == 'g') {
            if (num_g - num_p >0) {
                score++;
                num_p++;
            } else {
                num_g++;
            }
        } else if (c == 'p') {
            if (num_g - num_p >0) {
                num_p++;
            } else {
                score--;
                num_g++;
            }
        }
    }

    printf("%d\n", score);

    return 0;
}
